problem_text_cn: 如图,点c是⊙O的直径AB延长线上一点,CD切⊙O于点D,DE为⊙O的弦,若∠AED=60°,⊙O的半径是2．则CD的长()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point C is a point on the extended line AB of the diameter of ⊙O, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point D, DE is the chord of ⊙O, if ∠AED = N_0, the radius of ⊙O is N_1. The length of CD is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,∵OA=OB,∠E=60°,∴△OAE为等边三角形,∴∠1=60°,∴∠2=60°,∵CD切⊙O于点D,∴OD⊥CD,∴∠ODC=90°,在Rt△ODC中,tan∠2=\frac{CD}{OD},∴CD=2tan60°=2√{3}．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质:圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径．也考查了等边三角形的判定与性质．
